H3.text: who changed the role of the first lady. Dolley Madison

A4.text: By innovating political institutions as the wife of James Madison, Dolley Madison did much to define the role of the president's spouse.

A5.text: She was known for holding Washington social functions in which she invited members of both political parties, essentially spearheading the concept of bipartisan cooperation.
